name: Reaper's Mark
description: Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 20 seconds.  When a marked enemy dies, you heal for 10243, and you gain Major Berserk, increasing your damage done by 10% for 5 seconds.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You can only have one Reaper's Mark active at a time.
effectLines: If the marked enemy dies, you heal for more and gain Major Berserk, increasing your damage done.
coefDescription: Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 20 seconds.  When a marked enemy dies, you heal for $1, and you gain Major Berserk, increasing your damage done by 10% for 5 seconds.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You can only have one Reaper's Mark active at a time.
rawDescription:
Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by <<1>> for <<2>>.

When a marked enemy dies, you heal for <<3>>, and you gain Major Berserk, increasing your damage done by <<4>> for <<5>>. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.

You can only have one <<6>> active at a time.
